title: What Did You Allow Your Kids To Do So They Would Stop Screaming?
description:
Being a parent is tough, especially when your child is screaming over something you refuse to let them do. But sometimes, you give in to get some peace, we get it. It happened recently to Kristin, and she wants to know she's not alone. So what did you allow your kid to do so they would stop screaming?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
